title: "Projects"

My Fall 2024 rotation project revolved around the theme of "information borrowing" and efficiency gains in inference. We are interested in the setting of hybrid and externally controlled clinical trials where there is a small cohort of individuals enrolled in the trial but there exists a potentially large reference population of individuals whose counterfactual under no treatment is observed.
